alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 1:23PM PDT until April 18 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest to West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...South-central Elko County, Southeastern Elko County, Southern Lander County, Southern Eureka County, Northern Nye County, and White Pine County. * WHEN...Through 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Crosswinds will be most prevalent along north to south routes and roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
